about.p1: Established in Wanaherang, Gunung Putri, Bogor Regency, AKATE Engineering Indonesia began by providing fabrication and machining services including lathe, milling, and drilling operations.
about.p2: After nearly 3 years of operation, AKATE Engineering has evolved into a comprehensive company offering engineering solutions, Special Purpose Machines, general fabrication, machining services, and expanding into industrial equipment distribution and trading.
hero.partner: Your trusted partner for comprehensive engineering solutions, precision fabrication, and cutting-edge FEA analysis
footer.copyright: {year} AKATE Engineering Indonesia. All rights reserved.
footer.description: AKATE Engineering Indonesia - Your trusted partner for comprehensive engineering solutions, precision fabrication, and innovative industrial services.
about.motto: Committed to becoming a One Stop Engineering Solution provider, delivering added value to all industry players through innovation and technology.

services.feaPara1: Our advanced Finite Element Analysis services ensure structural integrity and compliance with ASME BPVC standards. We provide comprehensive stress analysis, deformation studies, and safety assessments for critical industrial equipment.
services.feaPara2: All analyses follow ASME codes with Unity Check (UC) and Stress Ratio (SR) assessments to guarantee safe and reliable designs.
